data.InstructionQuestionTextM: Your team has been instructed to enter the hot zone in Level A PPE. You have decided to split into two teams: Bio-1 Alpha and Bio-1 Bravo. What PPE should the entering team, Bio-1 Alpha, don?
data.InstructionQuestionTextL: Your Bio-1 team at the ECP has been instructed to enter the hot zone in Level A PPE. They have split into two teams: Bio-1 Alpha and Bio-1 Bravo. What PPE should the entering team don?
